name: Nika.eco
description: Nika.eco helps companies who are offsetting emissions through carbon credits to understand the quality of such credits and where to get the best-quality carbon credits with Nika.eco's proprietary remote sensing technology. Nika.eco also has its own portfolio of nature-based carbon projects of high quality. Nika.eco also has its own portfolio of nature-based carbon projects of high quality.
